Subset of World Values Survey

Source: R/data.R
wvs_us_wave6.Rd

This data set contains a small subset of Wave 6 of the World Values Survey. The subset is specifically only responses collected in the U.S., and contains a fraction of the dimensions, which were renamed to more semantically clearer names.

wvs_us_wave6

Format

A 28-dimensional data.frame of questionnaire responses, unnormalized.

Source

http://www.worldvaluessurvey.org/WVSDocumentationWV6.jsp

Details

The dimensions correspond the following question codes (in order): V4, V5, V7, V8, V9, V10, V11, V23, V24, V25, V29, V30, V32, V55, V56, V57, V58, V59, V60, V61, V67, V68, V69, V84, V95, V97, V98, V101

Please refer to the WV6 codebook for more details on the questions and responses.
